product.name: Rose
product.description: Their stems are usually prickly and their glossy, green leaves have toothed edges

product.name: Sunflower
product.description: The common sunflower has a green erect stem covered in coarse hairs, growing on average around 2m tall.

product.name: Tulips
product.description: Tulips are erect flowers with long, broad, parallel-veined leaves and a cup-shaped, single or double flower at the tip of the stem.

product.name: Gumamela
product.description: Gumamela is an erect, much-branched, glabrous shrub, 1 to 4 meters high.

product.name: Lavender
product.description: Lavender flowers represent purity, silence, devotion, serenity, grace, and calmness.

product.name: Hyacinth
product.description: Hyacinth is a hardy, perennial, bulbous herb in the Hyacinthaceae (hyacinth) family..

product.name: Crocus
product.description: Crocus is a genus of seasonal flowering plants in the family Iridaceae comprising about 100 species of perennials growing from corms..

product.name: Peony
product.description: Peony is a light, airy flower scent. Peonies have a variety of scents, from pink and sweet to lemony and peppery..

product.name: Cherryblossoms
product.description: Its flowers are nearly pure white, tinged with the palest pink, especially near the stem..

product.name: BlueBell
product.description: The bluebell is a herb that grows from a bulb. It has linear leaves and a flowering stem that grows up to 50 cm tall and droops to one side..
